data.title: Don’t Blame Karma! Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Netflix
data.meta_description: Don’t Blame Karma! is a 2022 romantic comedy film directed by Elisa Miller. It follows a young woman who blames all of her bad luck on karma. She soon has to deal with her sister who has a completely opposite relationship with karma. All of this leads her to make a huge risky decision. Here’s […] The post Don’t Blame Karma! Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Netflix appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
data.text:
Don’t Blame Karma! is a 2022 romantic comedy film directed by Elisa Miller. It follows a young woman who blames all of her bad luck on karma. She soon has to deal with her sister who has a completely opposite relationship with karma. All of this leads her to make a huge risky decision.

Here’s how you can watch and stream Don’t Blame Karma! via streaming services such as Netflix.

Is Don’t Blame Karma! available to watch via streaming?

Yes, Don’t Blame Karma! is available to watch via streaming on Netflix.

The film follows the story of Sara, a girl who thinks karma has a personal grudge against her. One day she learns that her sister Lucy, is engaged to a guy named Aarón and will marry him very soon. This takes her by surprise as Aarón turns out to be the boy she had a crush on back in high school. Not having met him in ten years he is now her soon-to-be brother-in-law. She has to deal with this situation and a lot more, including her online boyfriend showing up and also her parent’s unexpected separation.

The film features Aislinn Derbez as Sara, the fashion designer tired of her bad luck. Renata Notni plays Lucy, her sister who will soon marry Sara’s childhood crush. We also see Giuseppe Gamba as Roberto, Sara’s online boyfriend.

Watch Don’t Blame Karma! streaming via Netflix

Don’t Blame Karma! is available to watch on Netflix.

It is a leading streaming service that provides subscribers with a very huge library of on-demand content. It also features hit original series like Narcos, Money Heist and Bridgerton.

You can watch via Netflix by following these steps:

Visit netflix.com/signup

Choose a payment plan from the following:

$6.99 per month (standard with Ads)

$15.49 per month (Standard)

$22.99 per month (Premium)

Enter your email address and password to create an account

Enter your chosen payment method

The cheapest Netflix Standard with Ads Plan provides all but a few of its movies and TV shows. However, it will show ads before or during most of its content. You can watch in Full HD and on two supported devices at a time.

Its Standard Plan provides the same but is completely ad-free while also allowing users to download content on two supported devices with an additional option to add one extra member who doesn’t live in the same household.

The Premium Plan provides the same as above, though for four supported devices at a time, with content displaying in Ultra HD. Users get to download content on up to six supported devices at a time and have the option to add up to two extra members who don’t live in the same household. Netflix spatial audio is also supported.

Don’t Blame Karma!’s synopsis is as follows:

“The travails of Sara, a frustrated fashion designer who blames karma for her bad luck. Fate will put her face to face with her sister, Lucy, who enjoys very different luck, and in a series of events and reunions that will lead her to make a radical decision.”

NOTE: The streaming services listed above are subject to change. The information provided was correct at the time of writing.
